author: Updated February
title: Yankees Photo Day 2017 | Newsday
text:
Click here to read or post comments (Credit: Newsday / J. Conrad Williams Jr.) 
New York Yankees manager Joe Girardi and first base coach Tony Pena pose for a photo during spring training at George M. Steinbrenner Field in Tampa, Florida on Tuesday, Feb. 21, 2017. Yankees Photo Day 2017 February 21, 2017 8:46 PM By NEWSDAY.COM Yankees players posed for the camera at Photo Day during spring training on Feb. 21, 2017 in Tampa, Florida. (Credit: Newsday / J. Conrad Williams Jr.)
